articles.title: England in Pakistan: Dawid Malan guides tourists to Twenty20 series win - BBC
articles.description: Dawid Malan hits an unbeaten 78 as England beat Pakistan by 67 runs in the seventh T20 international to clinch a 4-3 series win.
articles.content:
Dawid Malan returned to form with an unbeaten 78 as England clinched the T20 series
